summary: The Holy Grail is a legendary treasure from Arthurian stories. It's often described as a magical cup or stone with amazing powers, like healing or providing endless food. First mentioned in a story by Chr√©tien de Troyes around 1190, it's been depicted in many ways over time. Some say it was the cup used by Jesus at the Last Supper. The Grail's true origins are unclear, but it has inspired lots of books, movies, and even conspiracy theories.
title: Holy Grail
